@StickN2daScript Why thank you, friend :) We all have to band together with the truth to ensure our country is honorable for ALL Americans.
@shannonwoodward This tweet is life.
@Scottm4174 Regardless of his personal lives, Lewis has proven he cares about fellow Americans. Trump has conned & sued ppl his entire life.
@Scottm4174 No, Trump's role is a bit more important than a minister. He has never done ANYTHING heroic compared to MLK and Lewis.
@Scottm4174 He has repeatedly been caught lying and degrading ppl because they don't agree w/ him. He doesn't deserve respect like MLK/Lewis
@Scottm4174 They cared about people other than just themselves, whereas Trump cares about making money and his own reputation.
@Scottm4174 Regardless of his personal life, both men SERVED their country far more than Trump ever has. They fought for equal human rights.
@Scottm4174 Because of MLK and Lewis's actions, racial equality was able to happen and the KKK weren't murdering ppl like before.
@Scottm4174 MLK ENSURED RACIAL EQUALITY IN AMERICA. That saved MILLIONS OF LIVES. And you care about his adultery? Give me a break.
@Scottm4174 How can someone take a President seriously when they cheat on their wife? Trump cheated on all wives. Does that change his work?
@Scottm4174 White men started the KKK with the intent to murder black ppl. The peaceful black marches were "riots" but KKK was morally good?
@Scottm4174 How was he two-faced? Explain to me with proven facts, please. Because he saved LIVES & progressed America to be racially equal.
@Scottm4174 The KKK were lynching black people daily, and yet you think they weren't heroes despite saving lives from racial murders?
@Scottm4174 Your opinion being that MLK and Lewis aren't heroes because they caused "riots" during the Civil Rights Movement.
@Scottm4174 If you're going to say racist things like the Civil Rights Movement was just black men causing riots, then I'm going to respond.
@Scottm4174 No one is threatening you. My disagreeing with you is MY OPINION and I have every right to utilize the truth and facts.
@Scottm4174 Oh, but let's have racial inequality and lynching because a black man talking about racial equality causes too much of a stir.
@Scottm4174 A riot? You mean like how the KKK ran rampant during that time and murdered people? He wasn't a hero for standing up to them?
@shannonwoodward He's trying to claim MLK Jr. isn't a hero to him because he "fought for only one race". Sums up his reason for voting DT.
@Scottm4174 MLK opened the doors for equality in this country, and John Lewis changed America for the better. You believe in oppression.
@Scottm4174 Because he was black and fought for racial equality? Got it. You're just a racist who thinks Trump is a hero for being a conman.
@Scottm4174 So you honestly believe his actions weren't heroic because you think racial inequality was the right thing? Was MLK not a hero?
@Scottm4174 Google Lewis & learn about all of the good he's done for our country. Don't blindly support Trump because he's thin-skinned.
@Scottm4174 Yes, I've proved that by providing facts. You only have an ignorant opinion on real heroic history. Servicemen honor Lewis.
@Scottm4174 He has also served his home state proudly and is well respected by Dems & GOP alike. You don't know what you're talking about.
@Scottm4174 John Lewis did put his life on the line & was beaten by police for peaceful marching with MLK Jr. Are you trying to demean that?
@Scottm4174 You don't know any real information. That's quite clear. He bribed a company to not switch countries by paying them billions.
@Scottm4174 Also, Trump has backtracked on campaign promises. He also expects taxpayers to pay for "the wall" & Mexico will reimburse. WTF?
@Scottm4174 John Lewis fought for EQUAL RIGHTS. That is a hero. During that time racial inequality was normal. He stood up for moral values.
@Scottm4174 His companies outsource manufacturing to China & Mexico. Trump didn't fight for his country - he lied to ditch out on service.
@Scottm4174 During his life, Trump has conned ppl put of $ and homes, committed sexual assault, & refused to pay taxes. THAT'S NOT HEROIC.
@Scottm4174 @ava You really know nothing about John Lewis and only care about defending Trump, who hasn't done anything to improve America.
@Scottm4174 @ava John Lewis marched with MLK Jr in Selma for civil rights and has proven he cares about America. DT was avoiding draft then.
@realDonaldTrump ...the fuck is wrong with you? #instantvomit
@Garcity So... what happened?
@realDonaldTrump You seem really pissed on. Oh, oops. I mean off. #goldenshowers #yellowsnowflake

@Nomo_Messiahs You will literally say ANYTHING to deflect against the ignorant bullshit that comes out of his mouth. HE SEXUALLY ASSAULTS.
@Nomo_Messiahs Google Billy Bush and Donald Trump talk. Trump literally says he has the right to do that to anyone because of his fame
@Nomo_Messiahs Are... are you serious? What about his DOZENS of accusers? Y'know, like when he said he could grab their pussies as a celeb?
@Nomo_Messiahs yes. Having women around him doesn't mean he doesn't think he has the right to sexually assault them
@Nomo_Messiahs "Libtards". Again with stupid, childish language. Can't come up with something original and not teenage sounding? /eyeroll
@Nomo_Messiahs Perhaps getting snappy information from YouTube videos isn't the wise choice. Encouraging biased misinfo isn't reasonable.
@Nomo_Messiahs I watched a portion of it, finding it devoid of actual facts. Are they actyally supported by a genuine moron like Milo?
@Nomo_Messiahs Anyone who has to use stupid, childish language like that is not a "Centerist" nor attempting to have logical discussions.
@Nomo_Messiahs https://t.co/sqDa7u5bC9 "Cuck" "Lefty Libtard" Pathetic, immature insults by pathetic, immature people. You're illogical.
@Nomo_Messiahs No, your page filled with inflammatory and misinformed "alt-right" BS aligns you with the rise of Nazi rhetoric currently.
@nickspencer That guy looks like a goddamn serial killer. His profile reads like one, too. Scary.
@Nomo_Messiahs @nickspencer Enjoy being affiliated with the new Nazi party. Bet being "alt-right" is totes awesome and not hateful at all.
@Nomo_Messiahs @nickspencer Glad you care more about sides that the entirety of America being represented. And no, he doesn't have more exp.
@Nomo_Messiahs @nickspencer Last I checked, Trump has no vast experience besides lawsuits. To use your own words: "so far not impressed."
